posts.title: Pusat V11 Gaming Mouse
posts.description: Adjustable 10000 DPI. 8 Programmable Keys. 1 Ms Reporting Rate. 7-Color RGB Lighting with. EffectsDurable and Comfortable Design.

posts.title: Pusat Gaming Headset Lite
posts.description: 40mm Headphone Diameter. 210cm Cable Length. Connection via USB.

posts.title: Pusat V5 Oyuncu Mouse
posts.description: Full-Size and Ergonomic Design. Adjustable 24000 DPI Surface Scan Sensitivity. Adjustable Weight Set. 11 Programmable Keys. 1 Ms Reporting Rate

posts.title: Pusat Clutch Gamepad
posts.description: Vibration and Motion Sensor. Phone Holder. XYAB RGB Led Indicators. Interchangeable D-Pad. XInput/DirectInput Support

posts.title: K3 Pro Mechanical Keyboard
posts.description: Red Mechanical Switch. Anti-Ghosting Feature for All Keys. Customizable RGB Lighting. Wrist Rest and Full-Size Design. Programmable Keys and Volume Dial

posts.title: Bukra V1 Bluetooth Speaker
posts.description: IPX7 Water and Dust Resistant. Up to 12 Hours of Music Listening Time. 20 Watt Sound Power.

posts.title: Oron Gaming Chair
posts.description: Backrest can be tilted 130 degrees backwards. Tilt Back Fixing. The Most Appropriate Design for Body Structure with Ergonomic Design.

posts.title: Pusat XL RGB Tulpar Mousepad
posts.description: QI Supported Wireless Charging Station (10Watt). Non-Slip Rubber Base. Different RGB Lighting Modes.

posts.title: Curved Gaming Monitor
posts.description: 32” Frameless Curved Widescreen 16:9. 165 Hz Screen Refresh Rate.1Ms Response Time. Built-in Speaker. HDR10 and MRPT Technologies.

posts.title: Gaming Headset Stand
posts.description: Robust and Durable Design with Adjustable RGB Lights. 2 USB Outputs. Data Transfer and Charging.
